title: "Click cancel and the reconnect button"
body:
I don't know about anyone else having this bug.

BUT THIS DOESN'T WORK, YOU CANNOT RECONNECT UNTIL THE GAME HAS STARTED.

Riot focus on fixing it, instead of telling us useless shit.

replies.body: I find bringing up task master and ending all league related processes gets that issue resolved.
thats been there since early season 4.
